entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 05 January 2023
